seconds.name: Seconds
seconds.description: The number of seconds to run the profiler.

seconds.name: Seconds
seconds.description: The number of seconds to run the memory profiler.

start_log_objects.name: Start logging objects
start_log_objects.description: Starts logging growth of objects in memory.

scan_interval.name: Scan interval
scan_interval.description: The number of seconds between logging objects.

stop_log_objects.name: Stop logging objects
stop_log_objects.description: Stops logging growth of objects in memory.

dump_log_objects.name: Dump log objects
dump_log_objects.description: Dumps the repr of all matching objects to the log.

type.name: Type
type.description: The type of objects to dump to the log.

start_log_object_sources.name: Start logging object sources
start_log_object_sources.description: Starts logging sources of new objects in memory.

max_objects.name: Maximum objects
max_objects.description: The maximum number of objects to log.

stop_log_object_sources.name: Stop logging object sources
stop_log_object_sources.description: Stops logging sources of new objects in memory.

lru_stats.name: Log LRU stats
lru_stats.description: Logs the stats of all lru caches.

log_thread_frames.name: Log thread frames
log_thread_frames.description: Logs the current frames for all threads.

log_event_loop_scheduled.name: Log event loop scheduled
log_event_loop_scheduled.description: Logs what is scheduled in the event loop.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether to enable or disable asyncio debug.

log_current_tasks.name: Log current asyncio tasks
log_current_tasks.description: Logs all the current asyncio tasks.
